facts.text: 1st recorded perihelion passage of Halley's Comet.
Boudouin IV with the Beard becomes earl of Flanders
The people of Sicily rebel against the Angevin king Charles I, in what becomes known as the Sicilian Vespers.
Edward I sacks Berwick-upon-Tweed, during armed conflict between Scotland and England.
Ketsugan, Zen teacher, performs exorcisms to free aizoji temple
Prince Louis of Bourbon elected bishop of Liege
Duke Sigismund van Tirol ends contacts with Switzerland
Thomas Cranmer becomes archbishop of Canterbury
Battle at Mellifont: English army under Lord Mountjoy beats Irish
Playwright Voltaire crowned with laurel wreath
Carl Friedrich Gauss, German mathematician, discovers the construction of the heptadecagon
Napoleonic Wars: Sixth Coalition forces march into Paris after defeating Napoleon.
Murat issues the Rimini Declaration which would later inspire Italian Unification.
